comments.body:
> [@riot](#comment-1-18aUcwzGGoYGfgehK5XEYF5uyyBDbF5doA): despite everyone's sad, paranoid delusions, there's no feminist conspiracy

despite riot's sad, complacent delusions, nobody mentioned a feminist conspiracy except her/his/their sorry uninformed self

another way of asking this very same question would be: « did the Tor project just get CANCER ??? »

the results would be the same, I'm sure
